subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Noah Rubin, a 17-year-old from Long Island and a product of the John McEnroe Tennis Academy, recorded his first singles victory at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center.
snippet: Noah Rubin, a 17-year-old from Long Island and a product of the John McEnroe Tennis Academy, recorded his first singles victory at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center.
